title: Lol client stops in the middle of my rank games
body: Hello! Everytime i play ranked in like 5-10 minutes my lol.client just suddenlly stopps. Without warrning me. It just stops working. And this only happens in ranked games. It started to happen at new patch ( patch 6.21 ). I really don't wanna get banned because of the AFK, so please give me an answer or somehing that will fix this problem.

replies.body: This error along with bugsplats can occur if a driver crashes or something fails to render the game.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this for a fix.  Let me know if that helps!
